text: The House of the Seven Gables is a 1940 American drama movie directed by Joe May and is the second adaption of the 1851 novel of the same name by Nathaniel Hawthorne. It stars George Sanders, Margaret Lindsay, Vincent Price, Dick Foran, Nan Grey, Cecil Kellaway, Alan Napier, Gilbert Emery and was distributed by Universal Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1941. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1940 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Joe May
title: The House of the Seven Gables (movie)
